result.title: Brochure detailing the key success/failure factors from the assessed social innovations
result.description: The results of task 6.1 will be presented in a brochure to be used by anyone interested in implementing social innovation measures. The brochure will contain the key factors, found in task 6.1, which led to the success (or failure) of the social innovation measures/interventions examined in WP1 (self-organisation, sharing/group schemes), in the form of a features which should replicate (or avoid).

result.title: Communication and Dissemination activities I
result.description: The deliverable will describe the communication and disseminating activities put in place during the first 12 months of the project. These will include also the construction of the CATCH-EyoU Web site and a Web platform (on the FNG web site). The website will be linked to the existing youth and consortiumâ€™s websites. It will give access to project newsletter, WPs outputs and deliverables. The web platform (on the FNG web site) will consent the publication of ongoing and final results addressed to young people ages 15-30
